entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 30 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times early in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 in the evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
